description: Capacity Building of Local Governance - Development of Enabling Economic Environment

subproject.description:
The project supports the strategic development planning processes at local level and financing priority demonstration projects.  The focus is on:
1) bringing together representatives from public and private sector to develop local economic development partnerships; 
2) definining the priorities and potentials and 3) development of local economic development action plans.  
The project also supports priority demonstration projects in the target municipalities.
subproject.title: Local Economic Development

title: Promoting Local Economic Development
